content: the youth damask cardigan is a timeless textured knit that s perfect for kids ages 3-14 featuring the same elegant damask stitch pattern as the damask socks 1 and damask hat 2 this drop-sleeve crew neck cardigan is a versatile addition to any wardrobe knit flat and sewn together it s an excellent project for advanced beginners looking to explore garment knitting the textured knit/purl stitch gives the appearance of cables without the extra effort while cascade 220 superwash yarn affiliate link 3 ensures the cardigan is soft durable and easy to care for pattern details sizes 3-14 yarn cascade 220 superwash amount varies by size 4 needles us 6 4mm for ribbing us 7 4 5mm for the body construction worked flat seamed together features textured damask stitch crew neck drop sleeves 3/8-inch buttons this cardigan is stylish enough for special occasions and cozy enough for everyday wear whether you re knitting for one child or coordinating outfits for siblings the youth damask cardigan is sure to become a favorite skill level advanced beginner techniques used knit purl seaming buttonhole placement download the pattern for free and create a cardigan they ll love to wear 5 1 https //amandammorse com/free-sock-patterns-to-download-damask-socks/ 2 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-damask-hat/ 3 https //shrsl com/4t1bb 4 https //shrsl com/4t1bb 5 https //amandammorse com/free-easy-child-cardigan-pattern-the-youth-damask-cardigan/
